alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 14 at 8:53PM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...With minor to moderate coastal flooding possible, roads along the Gulf could become flooded quickly and be impassible. Low lying structures immediately along the waterfront could experience flooding and become isolated. Some flooding could be significant, especially along the Wakulla County Coastline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide is around 4 am ET on Sunday morning. While it is too early to specify how high water levels could rise around the time of high tide, water levels could rise quickly during the overnight hours.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
